articles.title: Ford F-150 joins the Rocket League - Fox News
articles.description: Ford will offer a playable F-150 in Rocket League as part of a collaboration with the online automotive soccer game.
articles.content:
Tesla may be working on a "rocket" powered car, but Ford beat it to it. At least in the digital world.
(Ford)
The Ford F-150 will be available to buy as a playable vehicle in the automotive soccer … [+587 chars]
